data.name: Sample - ThreatBook - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "ThreatBook" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Loss Detection
workflows.description: Analyze the IP/domain name of external access scenarios such as office network/production network, and accurately determine whether the IP/domain name is malicious, risk severity level, and credibility level through judgment rules; accurately identify remote control (C2) and malware (Malware) , mining pool threats, provide relevant security incidents or gang labels, etc.

workflows.name: Submit URL for Scanning
workflows.description: Detect any URL through 11 URL scanning engines and URL/domain name blacklist services, analyze the files downloaded by the URL, and generate a URL scanning analysis report.

workflows.name: Get Domain Name Context
workflows.description: For malicious domain names that have been hit in the breach detection, the context information is queried to obtain evidence collection and disposal advice.

workflows.name: Submit File
workflows.description: For suspected malicious files such as office terminals, Web/FTP/mail attachments, and suspicious files on terminals/servers, 22 anti-virus scanning engines are used to quickly detect them, and according to different file types, the system automatically selects a runnable sandbox environment for dynamic detection.

workflows.name: Submit IP for Analysis
workflows.description: Analyze business logs and external IPs obtained from security devices such as firewalls and WAFs. Obtain IP-related geographic location, ASN information, and comprehensively determine threat types such as: Remote Control (C2), Zombie, Compromised, Scanner, Phishing, etc., related attack gangs or security incidents Tags, raw intelligence, relevant sample information, etc.

workflows.name: Get File Reputation
workflows.description: Obtain detailed static analysis & dynamic analysis reports of files, including file summary information, network behavior, behavior signature, static information, release behavior, process behavior, and anti-virus scan engine detection results.

workflows.name: Get URL Reputations
workflows.description: Get URL scan engine detection results, and analysis results of downloaded files.

workflows.name: Sub Domain Query
workflows.description: Advanced domain name query to obtain domain name subdomain information

workflows.name: Get File Detection Report
workflows.description: Get the results of files that have been detected by 22 anti-virus scanning engines.

workflows.name: Run Domain Advance Query
workflows.description: Advanced domain name query, obtain the historical Whois information of the domain name, and the historical resolution IP information of the domain name.

workflows.name: Run IP Advance Query
workflows.description: IP advanced query, obtain IP current domain name, historical domain name information.

workflows.name: Get IP Reputation
workflows.description: Analyze the IP of the inbound scenario, provide the geographical location and ASN information of the IP, and accurately determine whether the IP is malicious, the risk severity level, and the credibility level through the judgment rules; identify the threat.

workflows.name: Submit Domain for Analysis
workflows.description: Analysis can be performed on domain names pulled from internal DNS or some NGFWs. Obtain the IP address corresponding to the domain name, the current Whois, and comprehensively determine the threat.
